Description.Content: Provides support for defining xml configurations for custom spell-checkers.

Use 'spell-checker' as the root tag of the XML resource that describes an android.service.textservice.SpellCheckerService, which is referenced from its android.view.textservice.SpellCheckerSession SERVICE_META_DATA meta-data entry.
Defines the XML namespace, which must be 'http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android'.
The name of the spell checker.
Component name of an activity that allows the user to modify the settings for this service.
The locale of the subtype. This string should be a locale (e.g. en_US, fr_FR...). This is also used by the framework to know the supported locales of the spell checker.
The extra value of the subtype. This string can be any string and will be passed to the SpellChecker.
